item.title: Annual Median Home Sales Price Analysis
item.description: The analysis is on the median sales price of houses sold for the United States from 1963 to 2020.The dataset used has been obtained from Federal Reserve Economic Data, an online database with data representing the US economy from 1991. The goal is to follow the Box-Jenkins methodology for analyze and predict the median price of houses sold in the United States.The analysis is on the home sales of the 20 major U.S. metropolitan areas: Atlanta, Boston, Charlotte, Chicago, Cleveland, Dallas, Denver, Detroit, Las Vegas, Los Angeles, Miami, Minneapolis, New York, Phoenix, Portland, San Diego, San Francisco, Seattle, Tampa and Washington, D.C. The dataset used has been obtained from Federal Reserve Economic Data, an online database with data representing the US economy from 1991. The dataset contains 262 records, each record show a monthly home sales index between the years 2000 and 2021. Read more on GitHub

item.title: HackerNews Analysis
item.description: The analysis is on HACKER NEWS dataset that is a set of about 400 stories with more than 100 points on Hacker News. The goal is to use MongoDB with Python to resolve specific queries. Read more on GitHub

item.title: Monthly Home Sales Analysis
item.description: The analysis is on the home sales of the 20 major U.S. metropolitan areas: Atlanta, Boston, Charlotte, Chicago, Cleveland, Dallas, Denver, Detroit, Las Vegas, Los Angeles, Miami, Minneapolis, New York, Phoenix, Portland, San Diego, San Francisco, Seattle, Tampa and Washington, D.C. The dataset used has been obtained from Federal Reserve Economic Data, an online database with data representing the US economy from 1991. The dataset contains 262 records, each record show a monthly home sales index between the years 2000 and 2021.

item.title: Predictive Word System
item.description: The text prediction for a particular user’s texting or typing saves a lot of time by understanding the user’s patterns of texting. The work aims to obtain a simple “predictive word system” by learning from “I promessi sposi” . Read more on GitHub
